entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: DamianNeal/CSV-Jease-Import-Automation-Tool: A lightweight automation tool for importing CSV data into both Jease CMS and Adobe systems. Designed to simplify bulk content management and streamline data integration, this tool maps CSV fields to corresponding structures in Jease and Adobe platforms with minimal setup.
entry.content: A lightweight automation tool for importing CSV data into both Jease CMS and Adobe systems. Designed to simplify bulk content management and streamline data integration, this tool maps CSV fields to corresponding structures in Jease and Adobe platforms with minimal setup.

entry.title: reinarexha/Smart-Budget-Tracker: Smart Budget Tracker is a lightweight web app for managing income and expenses. It supports custom categories, budget limits, dark mode, and shows spending insights with a pie chart. All data is saved locally using JavaScript and Chart.js, with no backend required.
entry.content: Smart Budget Tracker is a lightweight web app for managing income and expenses. It supports custom categories, budget limits, dark mode, and shows spending insights with a pie chart. All data is saved locally using JavaScript and Chart.js, with no backend required.
